title: _SET_GHOSTED_ENTITY_ALPHA
content:
0x658500AE6D723A7E// SetGhostedEntityAlpha
void _SET_GHOSTED_ENTITY_ALPHA(int alpha);Parameters:alpha: A value between 1 and 254. Default: 128Sets the alpha value used by _SET_LOCAL_PLAYER_AS_GHOST, SET_NETWORK_VEHICLE_AS_GHOST, and _NETWORK_SET_ENTITY_GHOSTED_WITH_OWNER.'Solidness' cannot be achieved using 255 - this will have the opposite effect of it defaulting to 128 it seems (or just having no effect at all).
